Full Memory: Hermione spends countless hours over weeks with Harry and Ron, trying to find out who  Nicolas Flamel is. When Harry finds his name on a Chocolate Frog card, hearing the little blurb on the card reminds her of a book she was reading, She, Harry and Ron discover that Nicolas Flamel is the creator of the philosophers stone (sometimes referred to as the sorcerers stone), a powerful artifact that can grant eternal life, and turn any metal into gold. They now believe that the philosophers stone is being kept at hogwarts, and that Snape is trying to steal the stone for himself.
Brief Summary: After weeks of study and research, Harry, Ron, and Hermione discover who Nicolas Flamel is, and the existence of the philosophers stone.
